## Rule 1: Save Task Files
**When requested** → Save task file to `docs/tasks/`

**Format**: `[TICKET-CODE] - [ticket-title].md`

**Example**: `TASK-001 - Implement user authentication.md`

**Note**: Ticket code must be UPPERCASE

## Rule 2: Save Plan Files
**When creating plan from task** → Save to `docs/plans/`

**Format**: `[TICKET-CODE] - [plan-title].md`

**Example**: `TASK-001 - Authentication Implementation Plan.md`

**Note**: Ticket code must be UPPERCASE
